pages.text: Besides the bees producing resources there are a few bees with special tasks.

pages.title: Farmer Bee
pages.text: Will harvest nearby crops and leave the produce on the ground.

pages.title: Rancher Bee
pages.text: Will milk nearby cows and create milky combs in its hive.

pages.title: Hoarder Bee
pages.text: Collects items on the ground and puts them in its hive.$(br)Combine with the farmer bee for an automated farm.

pages.title: Lumber Bee
pages.text: Nibble on nearby wood and collects wood chips in its hive. Wood chips can be crafted into logs.

pages.title: Quarry Bee
pages.text: Nibble on nearby stone, sand or gravel and collects stone chips in its hive. Stone chips can be crafted into its counterpart block.

pages.title: Dye Bee
pages.text: Produces dye based on the flower it has pollinated.

pages.title: CuBee
pages.text: The pheromones secreted from this bee gets animals in the mood.
